text: Wine was thusadded to the list of mood-altering beverage such as ale available to establish social networks in Iron Age Europe. Attic potteryfragments found at the hillforts such as Heuneburg in Germany and luxury goods such as the monumental found at Vix in Burgundy supply archaeological evidence of thisinteraction . Organic containers such as leather or wooden wine barrels may also have travelled north into Europe but have notsurvived  .
